course_title: Special Topics: Film and Media: Intro. to Dramatic Writing
class_notes:
(Same as ENGCW 389W1, THEA 385W 1)
0002 - (Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)
Complete course atlas information (including texts and grading) will be available on the Creative Writing Program website: https://creativewriting.emory.edu/index.html
course_description: Rotating topics in film and media. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
prerequisites: FILM 102 and (FILM 201 or FILM 202 or FILM 203 or FILM 204 or FILM_OX 204 or FILM 205) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
